about_the_game:
In Deeplands you are a dwarven miner exploring procedurally generated cave systems which are filled with dangerous creatures, traps, riches and mysterious artifacts. In search of a relic from a long gone dynasty you forge your path through fully destructible terrain with a set of versatile tools and risky platforming maneuvers. Venture deep into these perilous caves to uncover the mysteries of the Deeplands in this open-cave roguelike platformer!

Key Features:


  • Open World - Explore a vast cave system without level transitions and seamlessly traverse through ancient structures and winding tunnels.
  • Uncover Secrets - The world of Deeplands won't hold your hand on your journey through it. Be vigilant and observe how the environment reacts to your actions. Explore the in-game manual to learn more about hidden mechanics and tricks you that will help you progress.
  • Emperor Of The Caves - Master your tools and strategies to overcome the countless challenges awaiting you in the caves and dungeons below to recover the ancient dwarven crown, restoring the glory of your kin.
  • Navigation - As you explore the world your map will show you all the caves and places you have discovered. Use it to find your way around and eventually back to the surface.
  • Dynamic Soundtrack - Watch out for subtle changes in the music as all of them communicate different things about your surroundings and current situation.
  • Stat-Tracker - The game keeps track of all your adventures - failure and success alike. Access these statistics from the main menu to see how fast, brutal or greedy you have been.
detailed_description:
In Deeplands you are a dwarven miner exploring procedurally generated cave systems which are filled with dangerous creatures, traps, riches and mysterious artifacts. In search of a relic from a long gone dynasty you forge your path through fully destructible terrain with a set of versatile tools and risky platforming maneuvers. Venture deep into these perilous caves to uncover the mysteries of the Deeplands in this open-cave roguelike platformer!

Key Features:


  • Open World - Explore a vast cave system without level transitions and seamlessly traverse through ancient structures and winding tunnels.
  • Uncover Secrets - The world of Deeplands won't hold your hand on your journey through it. Be vigilant and observe how the environment reacts to your actions. Explore the in-game manual to learn more about hidden mechanics and tricks you that will help you progress.
  • Emperor Of The Caves - Master your tools and strategies to overcome the countless challenges awaiting you in the caves and dungeons below to recover the ancient dwarven crown, restoring the glory of your kin.
  • Navigation - As you explore the world your map will show you all the caves and places you have discovered. Use it to find your way around and eventually back to the surface.
  • Dynamic Soundtrack - Watch out for subtle changes in the music as all of them communicate different things about your surroundings and current situation.
  • Stat-Tracker - The game keeps track of all your adventures - failure and success alike. Access these statistics from the main menu to see how fast, brutal or greedy you have been.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: 32bit CPU with SSE2 instructions, 64bit CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: 32bit CPU with SSE2 instructions, 64bit CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 or newer
  • Processor: 64bit or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 or newer
  • Processor: 64bit or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Deeplands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 32bit CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any 64bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 64bit CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Explore the Deeplands, an ancient underground world harboring the remnants of a lost civilization. Fight and parkour your way through destructible caves and dungeons, acquire mysterious powers and tools to grow stronger and recover the ancient dwarven crown in this open-cave roguelike platformer!
